title: following provisions of the Public Health (Alcohol) Act 2018 (No. 24 of 2018)
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Public Health (Alcohol) Act 2018
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Public Health (Alcohol) Act 2018 

(Commencement) (No. 2) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited public health (alcohol) act 2018 (commencement) (no 2) order 2021

title: following provisions of the Public Health (Alcohol) Act 2018 (No. 24 of 2018)
heading: 2. The 24th day of November 2021 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 24th day of November 2021 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Public Health (Alcohol) Act 2018 (No. 24 of 2018) 
come into operation: 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

section 10; 

subsections (10) to (12) of section 12; and 

subsections (4) to (6) of section 13.
text_norm: 2 24th day november 2021 appointed day following provision public health (alcohol) act 2018 (no 24 2018) come operation (a) (b) (c) section 10 subsection (10) (12) section 12 subsection (4) (6) section 13

title: following provisions of the Public Health (Alcohol) Act 2018 (No. 24 of 2018)
heading: 3. The 24th day of November 2022 is appointed as the day on which section
text_raw:
3. The 24th day of November 2022 is appointed as the day on which section 
4 of the Public Health (Alcohol) Act 2018 (No. 24 of 2018) comes into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

23 November, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 26th November, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [613] 3
text_norm: 3 24th day november 2022 appointed day section 4 public health (alcohol) act 2018 (no 24 2018) come operation given official seal 23 november 2021 stephen donnelly minister health notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 26th november 2021 613 3

title: following provisions of the Public Health (Alcohol) Act 2018 (No. 24 of 2018)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of this Order is to commence section 4, section 10, subsections (10) 
to (12) of section 12 and subsections (4) to (6) of section 13 of the Public Health 
(Alcohol) Act 2018. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [613]
